wikipedia_page.main: Myles Edward Sinclair Hesson (born 5 June 1990 in Birmingham) is a British professional basketball player who last played for Élan Chalon of the LNB Pro A in France.

response: The club has produced many professional players, most notably Great Britain internationals Myles Hesson and Kofi Josephs.https://cobbasketball.co.uk/history/cob-roll-of-honour/
